original_text:
E-Force
Con la nuova slot di Yggdrasil, E-Force, giocheremo con Wild, Scatter e moltiplicatori progressivi in grado di farci vincere fino a 10.000 volte la puntata!
Arriva la Pasqua
Se vi piacciono le slot con una trama ben definita, personaggi indimenticabili e una buona dose di ironia, siete capitati nel posto giusto. L’ambientazione di E-Force, il nuovo gioco targato Yggdrasil, è il paese di Esterville in cui vive un gruppo di conigli guerrieri che ha il compito di difendere le uova pasquali dagli attacchi del dott. Zeppelin, una volpe astuta che farà di tutto per portarle via. I conigli non sono però anonimi guerrieri, ma veri e propri eroi che hanno fatto la fortuna di famosi film d’azione. Possiamo riconoscere quindi Rambo con l’immancabile fascia sulla fronte e mitra spianato, Commando con il lanciamissili, Chen/Bruce Lee e Indiana Jones. Il Wild, per dire, è un coniglio/Robocop.
La grafica è un piccolo capolavoro, lo stile è quello cartoon, impreziosito da alcune animazioni davvero simpatiche.
Che nulla sia stato lasciato al caso lo intuiamo anche dal comparto sonoro, caratterizzato da un motivetto incalzante suonato con strumenti veri.
Caratteristiche di E-Force
In questo gioco troviamo una griglia 5×3 con 243 modi per vincere e una scommessa che va da 0,10 € a un massimo di 100 €.
La vincita più alta è di 10.000x la puntata e si può raggiungere grazie ai Bonus di cui daremo conto nel prossimo paragrafo.
Si vince associando simboli identici su rulli consecutivi a partire da quello di sinistra e procedendo verso destra. Presente l’Autoplay, che ci permette di impostare un numero di giri prestabiliti e di farli andare in automatico.
La volatilità è media, mentre il ritorno teorico al giocatore (RTP) è del 96%.
Come si vince
Possiamo suddividere i simboli di E-Force in due gruppi, basso livello e alto livello. Le uova hanno un valore contenuto, mentre i 4 conigli pagano molto bene. Tra tutti, Rambo è il simbolo più remunerativo. Quando sullo stesso rullo compare più volte lo stesso simbolo allora si applica alla vincita un moltiplicatore pari al numero dei simboli; quindi, se per esempio sulla seconda bobina appaiono 3 simboli, allora la vincita sarà moltiplicata x3.
Robocop è il Wild, ma a differenza della stragrande maggioranza delle slot, qui sostituisce tutti i simboli compreso gli Scatter.
La volpe è lo Scatter, con 3 simboli si ha diritto a 3 Free Spins, con 4 simboli a 4 e così via. Inoltre, alle vincite verranno applicate un moltiplicatore pari al numero di Scatter che ha dato avvio al gioco Bonus. Ogni Scatter o Wild aggiuntivo, regalerà un ulteriore Free Spin e il moltiplicatore aumenterà di 1.
La funzione giri gratis può essere acquistata pagando 50 volte la scommessa. così da ottenere da 3 a 9 Free Spins, mentre con una somma di 500 volte la puntata, se ne ottengono 15.

Domande Frequenti 
Voglio giocare a E-Force sullo smartphone. Posso farlo?

Certo, si tratta di un gioco creato con architettura HTML5 che lo rende fruibile anche su dispositivi mobili come tablet e smartphone.



Dove posso giocare a E-Force?

In qualsiasi casinò online legale dotato di certificazione ministeriale.



Quali sono i simboli speciali di E-Force?

In questo gioco troviamo il Wild, un Jolly che sostituisce tutti i simboli compreso lo Scatter, e appunto lo Scatter, che ricompensa con giri gratis.

raw_translation.response:
If you're looking for a slot game with a well-defined plot, unforgettable characters, and a good dose of irony, you've come to the right place. Yggdrasil's latest game, E-Force, is set in the town of Esterville where a group of warrior rabbits have the task of defending Easter eggs from the attacks of Dr. Zeppelin, a cunning fox who will stop at nothing to steal them away. These rabbits are not anonymous warriors - they are true heroes who have made the fortune of famous action movies such as Rambo, Commando, Chen/Bruce Lee, and Indiana Jones. The graphics are a small masterpiece with a cartoon style, enhanced by some very funny animations. Even the sound design has been carefully thought out with a catchy tune played with real instruments.

E-Force features a 5x3 grid with 243 ways to win and a betting range from €0.10 to €100. The highest payout is 10,000 times the bet, and this can be achieved thanks to the bonuses we will describe in the next paragraph. You win by matching identical symbols on consecutive reels starting from the left and moving towards the right. Autoplay is also available here, allowing you to set a predetermined number of spins and let the game run automatically. The volatility is average, while the theoretical return to player (RTP) is 96%.

In E-Force, the symbols can be divided into two groups: low level and high level. The eggs have a low value, while the four rabbits pay very well. Among them, Rambo is the most profitable symbol. When the same symbol appears multiple times on the same reel, the win is multiplied by the number of symbols. For example, if three symbols appear on the second reel, then the win is multiplied by three. Robocop is the wild symbol, but unlike most slots, it substitutes all symbols including the scatter. The fox is the scatter symbol, and three symbols will earn you three free spins, four symbols will grant you four, and so on. Moreover, the win will be multiplied by the number of scatters that triggered the bonus game. Each additional scatter or wild symbol will grant an additional free spin and increase the multiplier by one. The free spin feature can be purchased by paying 50 times the bet, giving access to 3 to 9 free spins, while with a sum of 500 times the bet, 15 free spins can be obtained.

Frequently Asked Questions:
Can I play E-Force on my smartphone?
Certainly! It is a game created with HTML5 architecture, making it accessible on mobile devices such as tablets and smartphones.

Where can I play E-Force?
You can play E-Force on any legal online casino with ministerial certification.

What are the special symbols in E-Force?
In this game, we have the wild symbol, a wild card that replaces all symbols including the scatter. And of course, the scatter symbol that rewards with free spins.

E-Force is a slot game developed by Yggdrasil which is set in the town of Esterville where the task of the warrior rabbits is to defend Easter eggs from the cunning fox named Dr. Zeppelin. To portray the theme of the game, the graphics of this game are cartoonish; also, the game features timeless heroes like Rambo, Commando, Chen/Bruce Lee, and Indiana Jones, which makes it even more interesting.

Graphics and Sound Design

The graphics of E-Force are visually appealing with a cartoonish style, which is further enhanced with humorous animations. The sound design of the game is also exquisite with a catchy tune played with real instruments. Overall, the combination of graphics and sound makes this game a delight for the players.

Gameplay (Grid Size, Paylines, Betting Range)

E-Force features a 5x3 grid with 243 ways to win and a betting range from €0.10 to €100. The game has an average volatility level, and the theoretical return to player (RTP) is 96%. Players can set the autoplay feature, which allows them to set a predetermined number of spins while allowing the game to run automatically.

Symbols (Wilds, Scatters, High/Low Value Symbols)

E-Force has two types of symbols- low-level and high-level. The low-level symbols are the Easter eggs, and the high-level symbols are represented by four rabbits - Rambo, Commando, Chen/Bruce Lee, and Indiana Jones. The rabbit symbols pay well, and Rambo is the most profitable. The wild symbol is the Robocop, which acts as a substitute for all other symbols. The scatter symbol is represented by the cunning fox Dr. Zeppelin, which offers free spins when three or more of the symbols land on the reels. Additionally, each scatter or wild that lands on the reels during free spins will grant players additional spins and increase the multiplier by one.

Free Spin Feature

E-Force offers a free spin feature triggered by the scatter symbol where players can earn up to 15 free spins. During the free spins, each additional wild or scatter that appears on the reels will grant additional spins and increase the multiplier by one. Players can also purchase the free spin feature at a cost of 50 times their bet, which gives them access to 3 to 9 free spins, while a cost of 500 times the bet gives them 15 free spins.

Review: If you're looking for a slot game with a well-defined plot, unforgettable characters, and a good dose of irony, you've come to the right place. Yggdrasil's latest game, E-Force, is set in the town of Esterville where a group of warrior rabbits have the task of defending Easter eggs from the attacks of Dr. Zeppelin, a cunning fox who will stop at nothing to steal them away. These rabbits are not anonymous warriors - they are true heroes who have made the fortune of famous action movies such as Rambo, Commando, Chen/Bruce Lee, and Indiana Jones. The graphics are a small masterpiece with a cartoon style, enhanced by some very funny animations. Even the sound design has been carefully thought out with a catchy tune played with real instruments.

E-Force features a 5x3 grid with 243 ways to win and a betting range from €0.10 to €100. The highest payout is 10,000 times the bet, and this can be achieved thanks to the bonuses we will describe in the next paragraph. You win by matching identical symbols on consecutive reels starting from the left and moving towards the right. Autoplay is also available here, allowing you to set a predetermined number of spins and let the game run automatically. The volatility is average, while the theoretical return to player (RTP) is 96%.

In E-Force, the symbols can be divided into two groups: low level and high level. The eggs have a low value, while the four rabbits pay very well. Among them, Rambo is the most profitable symbol. When the same symbol appears multiple times on the same reel, the win is multiplied by the number of symbols. For example, if three symbols appear on the second reel, then the win is multiplied by three. Robocop is the wild symbol, but unlike most slots, it substitutes all symbols including the scatter. The fox is the scatter symbol, and three symbols will earn you three free spins, four symbols will grant you four, and so on. Moreover, the win will be multiplied by the number of scatters that triggered the bonus game. Each additional scatter or wild symbol will grant an additional free spin and increase the multiplier by one. The free spin feature can be purchased by paying 50 times the bet, giving access to 3 to 9 free spins, while with a sum of 500 times the bet, 15 free spins can be obtained.
